body.name: Hydration Water-Gel Toner, Facial Waterdrop Gel Toner with Trehalose & Vitamin Complex, Weightless Moisturizing for Day and Night, Quick Soothing Cooling Mask, 2.64 fl.oz.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 5 hrs 8 mins
features: WATER GEL TONER FOR WELL-NOURISHED SKIN: Dr+MEDM Hydration Water-Gel Toner is a light gel-type formula that contains moisturizing ingredients with trehalose, which turns into water droplets when it touches the skin. Our toner adheres to the skin to make it moist and healthy for a long time.

INCREASES SKIN'S WATER RETENTION CAPACITY: This water-based toner for face contains Aquaxyl that helps increase moisture retention in the epidermis and reduces moisture loss by reducing transdermal moisture loss. It helps keep the skin hydrated and moisturized, preventing dryness and flakiness.

SOOTHES AND CONDITIONS DRY, DAMAGED SKIN: Our facial toner soothes sensitive & irritated skin. Additionally, the toner contains vitamin complexes such as vitamins E, C, B3, B5, and B6, which supply various nutrients to the skin and help to take care of lively skin by acting as skin conditioning agents.

RESTORES SHINE ADD OFFERS A GLOSSY FINISH: This moisture barrier repair toner with water drop formula bursts as soon as you apply it to the skin and make it moist and glossy for a long time. Snail Mucus Filtrate adds a glossy finish to dry skin while restoring moisture. It leaves the skin looking radiant and glowing.

TONER THAT MAINTAINS OIL-MOISTURE BALANCE: Our moisturizing toner with gel-type formula can be applied several times. Its texture is light and non-greasy, perfect for all skin types. Niacinamide in the toner strengthens the skin barrier and tightens pores, leaving your skin looking smooth and youthful.
body.description: Dr+MEDM Hydration Water-Gel Toner is a water-based, gel-type toner suitable for all skin types, including oily skin. It contains moisturizing ingredients, such as trehalose and Aquaxyl, which form a moisture barrier and help to maintain the skin's moisture level. This toner is not an astringent but a hydrating toner that soothes and conditions dry, damaged skin. It is perfect for those looking for a gel toner for face and a real moisturizing gel toner with moisturizing ingredients. The toner contains a vitamin complex, including vitamins E, C, B3, B5, and B6, which help to nourish the skin and maintain oil-moisture balance. It is an excellent hydrating toner for face that restores shine and offers a glossy finish.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars New type of toner
reviews.reviewText: Its texture is not watery at all and rather feels like a moisturizer but lighter and thin. Not greasy and sticky after use. Feels fresh and moist. I like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Removed Imperfections With Ease!
reviews.reviewText: I had been looking for a new toner to use and I’m glad that I got this one. It really does feel like using water on the skin with how thin the product is and it cleaned better than the toners that I’ve used before. I felt a bit disgusted seeing all of the dirt keep coming off with each but off cotton wipe. My face lit up a tiny bit after using this and it didn’t give my face an oily look. I had to check a few times because my face seemed beautiful but natural as if I hadn’t put any product. Usually when using a product, I feel like I can tell and it makes me feel a little bad. I don’t want too much shine or glow but I’m aware that most beauty products do that. I didn’t have to worry about this one though. It did its job without making me stand out from feet away and I had more icky stuff removed from face than ever before. I would definitely get this one again. My face wasn’t baby smooth but it felt naturally good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Mild and light
reviews.reviewText: The name is very confusing to me. This gel feels very mild and light on my sensitive oily skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite toner
reviews.reviewText: I have never used a toner like this and I love it! It seems like a lotion at first, but once it makes contact with the skin the texture changes completely and it becomes very liquid-y. It moisturizes really well, and honestly for some people, you could get away with just applying this or skipping some steps of a skincare routine. I like how hydrated and plump it makes my skin and how well it helps the following products to absorb so they can do what they are supposed to. I would definitely purchase this when I run out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: helps soothe my face great product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Toner or moisturizer? Methinks a moisturizer but clarification would be great. High quality K-beauty
reviews.reviewText: I was a bit confused by this product and the accompanying info on the tube itself. The product is called a 'toner' – but as a self-proclaimed skincare aficionado, I’ve always found that a toner is most often a liquid solution that can be misted or applied to the face using a cotton round. This feels more like a lightweight water-based moisturizer (and the instructions state to use this product as the last step in your skincare routine, which also indicates to me that it’s to be used as a moisturizer). Either way, I am loving it! I also love K-beauty – the products are on a different level, and nine out of ten times, they work perfectly for my skin, which can be a bit sensitive. I’m especially enjoying this product as the weather is getting warmer. It’s refreshing, absorbs quickly, and leaves my face feeling buoyant and hydrated. I have combination skin, so I tend to get oily in my T-zone, and this product doesn’t leave behind or generate any greasy residue to accentuate that. High quality product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Made my skin feel smooth and soft!
reviews.reviewText: This toner has made my skin feel so soft. I use it at night and in the morning before I put on my daily sunscreen. It is lightweight and has made a difference in the appearance and the overall condition of my skin. I have been using the product for about two months and my pores are less visible and some spots that had been irritated have cleared up. I have sensitive skin and this product has caused no issues for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely gel toner
reviews.reviewText: This was a lovely gel toner from a reputable company. I thought the toner was on the thicker side so I used it more as a serum, finishing with 2 layers of moisturzer. It absorbed nicely and wasn't overly sticky.
